meanings.definition: A flammable liquid used as fuel for internal combustion engines.
meanings.sent1: The car ran out of petrol on the highway.
meanings.sent2: I need to stop at the petrol station to fill up the tank.
meanings.sent3: The petrol sloshed in the can as I carried it carefully.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like petrol, igniting passion in everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The smell of petrol lingered in the garage, reminding me of road trips.

meanings.definition: To fill up a vehicle with petrol.
meanings.sent1: Dad will petrol the car before we leave for the trip.
meanings.sent2: Remember to petrol the lawnmower before starting the yard work.
meanings.sent3: He tried to petrol the bicycle, not realizing it ran on pedals, not fuel.
meanings.sent4: She would petrol her emotions, keeping them hidden from others.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic will petrol the tank with precision to avoid spills.
